title: List data transfer configurations
description: Lists all BigQuery Data Transfer Service transfer configurations for a given project.

objective.narrative: A developer or administrator needs to get an overview of all the data transfer jobs configured for a project. This is useful for auditing existing data pipelines, programmatically managing configurations, or identifying which transfers are active.

regionTags.name: bigquerydatatransfer_v1_datatransferservice_transferconfigs_list
regionTags.title: List data transfer configurations
regionTags.description: Lists all BigQuery Data Transfer Service transfer configurations for a given project.
